Productivity

Commander — Task Management System

A powerful command-line inspired task management and productivity platform that combines terminal efficiency with modern UI design.

Role
Full-Stack Developer
Timeline
4 months
Impact
CLI/GUI

Problem & Context

Traditional task management tools are either too simple for complex workflows or too complex for quick task entry. Commander bridges this gap with a command-line inspired interface.

Role & Scope

Developing a hybrid task management system that combines the speed of command-line interfaces with the clarity of modern graphical interfaces.

  • CLI/GUI Interface Hybrid command interface
  • Desktop Platform Cross-platform app
  • Efficiency Focus Developer productivity

Process

Command Interface

Building an intuitive command-line style interface that allows rapid task creation, organization, and management.

Visual Dashboard

Creating complementary visual interfaces for task overview, project management, and progress tracking.

Productivity Features

Implementing advanced features like task dependencies, time tracking, and workflow automation.

Outcomes

  • Developed hybrid CLI/GUI interface for efficient task management.
  • Created flexible project organization and dependency systems.
  • Built cross-platform desktop application with Electron.

Reflection & Next

The best productivity tools feel invisible - they enhance workflow without getting in the way. Commander aims to make task management as fast as thought.

Dev Talk — Developer Communication Platform

A streamlined communication platform designed specifically for development teams to collaborate effectively and share technical knowledge.
